Class Button

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class Button
extends javax.swing.JButton
    Action initialized JButton. If the button has an icon, the text label won't show on button.
    Author:
    Haifeng Li
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
